
hexxy
=====


.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/package_name.svg
   :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/hexxy
   :alt: Latest PyPI version


Usage
-----

.. code-block::

   $ hexxy 32333435 --p
   '2345'
   $ hexxy "parse text" --h
   '70617273652074657874'
